name: Itsy Bitsy Magic Shop
description:
Itsy Bitsy Magic Shop

Janelle the Witch is on her weekly trip to her local ingredients store. She wants to create some kind of magic, but she only has enough money for three ingredients.

This game contains 6 different endings, some harder than others.

Made for Mini Jam 8 - Fantasy. Limitation: Takes place in only 1 room.

Thank you to Adam for the bitsy engine, ayolland for the borksy tool, mildmojo and Sean for various hacks, and Emma for helping me with the code and for playtesting.

Note: Game not made with the itsy bitsy hack, unlike the title implies.
